name: Lights Out (itch) (MemelordDundy)
description:
Made as part of Mini Jam 100: Overload.

The ultimate end of order is darkness. The world has been turned cold and dark by beings long-gone. Entropy, however, the very essence of chaos, cannot be contained. Light is the chaos that gives everything its form, and light will once again rule.

A lone light shines in the darkness...

Lights Out is a puzzle game wherein you move characters around a dark map and interact with objects to open pathways and restore light to the world. For more information on how to play, see the hints menu in the game, which can be accessed from the main menu by pressing the button labeled "?".

Game and Art made by Dundy

Music made by Snabisch and licensed through Game Dev Market

Font made by GGBotnet
